tournament.name: Crokeyz Streets of New Capenna Tournament

decks.notes: The deck is focused on quickly playing and buffing Angel creatures to overwhelm the opponent. It includes powerful Angels like Elspeth Resplendent, Emeria's Call, and Firja's Retribution to gain advantage on the battlefield. The deck also includes cards like Righteous Valkyrie and Inspiring Overseer to further boost the Angel creatures. Additionally, it includes some counter spells like Negate to protect the creatures. Overall, the deck aims to aggressively play Angel creatures and quickly overpower the opponent with their strong abilities and synergy.
